verses.verse: O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou God <S%H410><s%> to whom vengeance <S%H5360><s%> belongeth <S%H410><s%>, Thou God to whom vengeance <S%H5360><s%> belongeth <S%H3313><s%>, shine forth.
Lift up <S%H5375><s%> thyself <S%H8199><s%>, thou judge of the earth <S%H776><s%>: Render <S%H7725><s%> to the proud <S%H1343><s%> their desert <S%H1576><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, how long shall the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, How long shall the wicked <S%H7563><s%> triumph <S%H5937><s%>?
They prate <S%H5042><s%>, they speak <S%H5042><s%> arrogantly <S%H6277><s%>: All the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> boast themselves <S%H559><s%>.
They break in pieces <S%H1792><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And afflict <S%H6031><s%> thy heritage <S%H5159><s%>.
They slay <S%H2026><s%> the widow <S%H490><s%> and the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, And murder <S%H7523><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>.
And they say <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> will not see <S%H7200><s%>, Neither will the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> consider <S%H995><s%>.
Consider <S%H995><s%>, ye brutish <S%H1197><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>; And ye fools <S%H3684><s%>, when will ye be wise <S%H7919><s%>?
He that planted <S%H5193><s%> the ear <S%H241><s%>, shall he not hear <S%H8085><s%>? He that formed <S%H3335><s%> the eye <S%H5869><s%>, shall he not see <S%H5027><s%>?
He that chastiseth <S%H3256><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, shall not he correct <S%H3198><s%>, Even he that teacheth <S%H3925><s%> man <S%H120><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, That they are vanity <S%H1892><s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> whom thou chastenest <S%H3256><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>, And teachest <S%H3925><s%> out of thy law <S%H8451><s%>;
That thou mayest give him rest <S%H8252><s%> from the days <S%H3117><s%> of adversity <S%H7451><s%>, Until the pit <S%H7845><s%> be digged <S%H3738><s%> for the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not cast off <S%H5203><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, Neither will he forsake <S%H5800><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
For judgment <S%H4941><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; And all the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall follow it <S%H310><s%>.
Who will rise up <S%H6965><s%> for me against the evil-doers <S%H7489><s%>? Who will stand up <S%H3320><s%> for me against the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>?
Unless <S%H3884><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had been my help <S%H5833><s%>, My soul <S%H5315><s%> had soon <S%H4592><s%> dwelt <S%H7931><s%> in silence <S%H1745><s%>.
When I said <S%H559><s%>, My foot <S%H7272><s%> slippeth <S%H4131><s%>; Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, held me up <S%H5582><s%>.
In the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of my thoughts <S%H8312><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me Thy comforts <S%H8575><s%> delight <S%H8173><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Shall the throne <S%H3678><s%> of wickedness <S%H1942><s%> have fellowship <S%H2266><s%> with thee <S%H3335><s%>, Which frameth mischief <S%H5999><s%> by statute <S%H2706><s%>?
They gather themselves together <S%H1413><s%> against the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, And condemn <S%H7561><s%> the innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>.
But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath been my high tower <S%H4869><s%>, And my God <S%H430><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my refuge <S%H4268><s%>.

And he hath brought <S%H7725><s%> upon them their own iniquity <S%H205><s%>, And will cut them off <S%H6789><s%> in their own wickedness <S%H7451><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> will cut them off <S%H6789><s%>.
